title: Lion Applique
description:
Bronze applique of a walking lion, head frontal. Tang for attachment under each foot and on top of had. Cross bar on back of each foot. Probably representing the god Mahes, a votive offering?
Condition: Broken across rear leg and tail. One paw missing. One chip on upper body (top edge). Tang on head broken. Considerable corrosion on body. Rear leg repaired.
dimensions:
5 5/8 x 8 1/8 in. (14.3 x 20.7 cm)
mount (Display backing made in 2015): 7 x 9 1/2 in. (17.8 x 24.1 cm)

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
